diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Insulinoma due to multiple pancreatic microadenoma
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was based on a combination of episodic neuroglycopenic hypoglycemia, elevated insulin and proinsulin levels detected during a supervised fasting test, and subsequent imaging and intra-arterial calcium stimulation tests that indicated pancreatic lesions, ultimately confirmed by pathology showing multiple subcentimeter insulin-secreting neuroendocrine tumors.
